thread.title: monty
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by monty

author: monty
title: monty
text: The staff was very connected to my concerns and all.They made phone calls with me throughout the entire process keeping me informed and asking me questions.Overall...it was a very smooth and pleasant experience.Any concerns,they were right on it.I recommend AAG fully.Great job gals!Thank you.
